leftSentences.text: Good morning. My name is Thomas Lee from Global Tech Solutions. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Have you attended this conference before?
Here's my business card. Please feel free to contact me.
I'd like to ask if you have any feedback on our proposal.
Could you please proofread this email before I send it to the client?

rightSentences.text: Thank you. Here's mine as well.
Of course. I'll be glad to look it over for any errors.
Yes, I think we've covered everything on this topic.
Actually, this is my first time. I'm looking forward to all the sessions.
I work as the Regional Marketing Director, overseeing our campaigns across Asia.
